title: 74/583/EEC: Council Decision of 20 November 1974 on the monitoring of sugar movements
header:
COUNCIL DECISION  of 20 November 1974  on the monitoring of sugar movements  (74/583/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall each week furnish the Commission with all relevant information on contractually committed quantities of sugar, on the volume of sales and purchases and on the presumed origin and destination of sugar involved in all such transactions.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 November 1974.
For the Council
The President
Ch. BONNET
